title: Introduction
content: Welcome to my portfolio. I am Ahmad Al-Qattu, a Full-Stack Developer specializing in React and Python.

title: Skills
content: I have expertise in a wide range of technologies including React, Python, JavaScript, Node.js, and more.

title: Projects
content: Here are some of the projects I have worked on. They include web apps, mobile apps, and various open-source contributions.

projects.name: Project Alpha
projects.description: A web application built with React and Node.js.

projects.name: Project Beta
projects.description: A mobile app developed using React Native.

projects.name: Project Gamma
projects.description: An open-source library for data visualization.

title: Contact
content: Feel free to reach out to me via email or LinkedIn for collaborations or inquiries.
